metadata.title: CVE-2018-11693 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
An issue was discovered in LibSass through 3.5.4. An out-of-bounds read ofa memory region was found in the function Sass::Prelexer::skip_over_scopeswhich could be leveraged by an attacker to disclose information ormanipulated to read from unmapped memory causing a denial of service.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-11693` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libsass1 - 3.5.5-2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: libsass package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.5.5-2').
